options.name: document
options.label: Document
options.info: Specify the document to be parsed. This can be a file property or an URL.

options.name: density
options.label: Density
options.info: This option specifies the image resolution. The higher the density, the better the quality of the output will be. However, higher density also means slower processing.

options.name: forceImage
options.label: Force image
options.info: Force the document to be scanned as an image. Sometimes this can result in a better output.
